description: Rikuo`s training continues. At the same time, Kyouto Youkai`s went at Touno Village, they offered Akagappa (leader of the village) to help Hagoromo-Gitsune fulfill her goal but of course Akagappa refuse. The Kyouto Yokai`s are preparing to leave the place, accidentally, they saw Rikuo and attemt to kill him. During the fight, Rikuo realize what is the real power of youkai nurarihyon and manage to cut the fear of his enemy. The enemies retreat and leaving a message that they will see each other again and in that time they will surely defeat him together with his clan and all onmyoji. The invasion of Hagoromo-Gitsune is finally start.
